The Great Experiment / Constitution Slide Show (3 open reels, tape)
The Great Experiment / Constitution Slide Show (3 open reels, tape)

Consists of three open reels with the identifying number T-9912 on each. The reels are labeled N-YHS Constitution 'Outs', "Constitution" Narrative Pulsed, and the third is labeled "The Great Experiment" and contains a typed script with annotations. The first two reels are audio; the third is uncertain but might be the slide show.
